bill.title: Recognizing the longstanding partnership between the United States and Australia to share critical firefighting resources during times of crisis.
bill.description: This resolution expresses support for Australia, as well as greater collaboration between the United States and Australia to promote wildfire mitigation and prevention.

history.action: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H203-204)
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia, the Pacific and Nonproliferation.
